name: Attention (lorenzoonowak)
description:
Description

In early March, a difficult part of the life of a little girl from the Ukrainian city of Kherson began. As a result of the shelling, she lost both her parents, and her house was destroyed. To survive, you need to get out of the dilapidated block of flats and catch the bus that will bring you to the refugee camp. Can you save this child or will she be forced to face russian invaders?

Control:

W,A,S,D - Move

Space - Jump

E, LMB - Interact

Esc - Menu

Note:

The game was made in a short time in order to convey to world the real events that are taking place in Ukraine at the moment as soon as possible. If you find any bugs, please report them to us. We also cooperate with several charitable foundations and taking donations to humanitarian assistance to Ukraine. For more information check out the game.
